message: I think this is a fair starting point. We can discuss it further if you'd like.
I'm trying to get a better deal. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better share than your previous offer.
I'm willing to give you a better deal, but I still think I deserve more. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
This is my final offer. It's the only way to get anything out of this deal.  Inflation is going to eat away at our share if we continue.
